name: Expo
description: Expo and EAS are an ecosystem of tools that help you develop review& deploy. Create universal native apps with React that run on Android, iOS, and the web.

apps.name: Expo Go SDK 52
apps.localizedDescription: Start building projects using web technologies with just your iOS device and your computer. Expo is a developer tool for creating experiences with interactive gestures and graphics using JavaScript and React.

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Give Expo projects permission to access your photos
privacy.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: Allow Expo projects to access your calendar
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Allow Expo projects to access your calendar
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow Expo Go to access your camera to take photos
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allow Expo projects to access your contacts
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Expo Go needs access to your local network to load projects from your development server
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Allow Expo projects to use your location
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Allow Expo projects to use your location
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: The app shows you the current location on a map and makes it available when you request it
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow Expo projects to access your microphone
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: Allow Expo projects to access your device accelerometer
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Give Expo projects permission to save photos
privacy.NSRemindersFullAccessUsageDescription: Allow Expo projects to access your reminders
privacy.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Allow Expo projects to access your reminders
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you

apps.name: Expo Go SDK 51

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: App saves photos to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: App uses camera to take photos.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: App uses microphone to record video.
